name: exlimddvf
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wi(w1, wi(wex(s0, w3), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wi(w1, wi(wex(s0, w3), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w1, wi(wex(s0, w3), w2))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s0, w2)
-| wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s0, w2)
-| wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))

|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s0, w2)
-| wi(wa(w3, w1), w2)

comment: A lemma for eliminating an existential quantifier. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
